at the search giant. No longer will Eric Schmidt sit in the CEO position-he has decided to step into the role of Executive Chairman, while Page slides in as CEO. The other Google cofounder, Sergey Brin , will devote his energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. Google made the announcement as part of its quarterly earnings report for the fourth fiscal quarter of 2010.
